section_title: 31b19. Hours of work for firemen and policemen.
text:
The
rules on hours of work for firemen and policemen are covered in Reg 553,
Subpart C, “Fire Protection and Law Enforcement Employees of Public Agencies.”
See also FOH Secs 31b21 and 31b22.
html: The rules on hours of work for firemen and policemen are covered in Reg 553, Subpart C, “Fire Protection and Law Enforcement Employees of Public Agencies.” See also FOH Secs 31b21 and 31b22.
